name: Rock University Presents the Naked Brothers Band
name_original: Rock University Presents the Naked Brothers Band
description:
Become a part of the Naked Brothers Band Tour! Use your Wii remote and nunchuk or microphone to sing along and play up to 5 instruments as each member of the band. Includes 25 of your favorite Naked Brothers Band songs. Play to unlock new songs, concert venues, outfits, instruments and more!

Features

• Customize your band member!
• Jam with your friends!
• You make the music with you favorite Naked Brothers Band songs!
